question:
Your English teacher has found a new penfriend for you. 
Write a letter to your penfriend and introduce yourself. 
Tell them what you like doing in your free time.
Ask your penfriend to tell you about their hobbies and interests.
text: My English teacher has introduced to you and told me that you are looking for a penfriend. Let me introduce myself. My name is Yan and I'm currently working as a technician in one of the overhead crane companies. I'm looking for a penfriend too. That's why I'm writing this to you.

Let me tell you my personal interests and hobbies and activities I like to do the most when my free time. I like jogging and hiking so I usually go out at weekends to the parks and recreation centres wherever it suits me to do my favourite activities. Normally, on weekdays, I seldom go out after I back from work and I spend my time reading because I find that reading is a kind of relaxation. I hate swimming and doing exercise at the gym. Sometimes, I play football with my old schoolmates. Although football is my favourite childhood sport, nowadays, I am doing very less on that.
I think these are enough for you to know about me. What about you? If you don't mind, share with me your interest in sports and activities.
Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
